summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to a recipient at a personal email address, requesting thoughts on an attached document. The email indicates a confidential treatment request by JPMorgan Chase, suggesting a connection to sensitive information related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email, reaching out for thoughts on a confidential document.

keyFacts: The email was sent on September 20, 2009.
The email is marked as confidential and relates to JPMorgan Chase.
The recipient's email address suggests a personal connection, but the name is not provided.
